metadata.title: RA4E1 and RA6E1 microcontrollers don't appear to natively support I2S interface, how are the digital microphones interfaced ?

sections.content:
Question:
RA4E1 and RA6E1 microcontrollers don't appear to natively support I2S interface, how are the digital microphones interfaced ?
Answer:
The I2S is emulated by using a combination of SPI and timer peripherals on RA MCU.
Suitable Products
MCU : RA4E1 or RA6E1
LDO : RAA214220
Op-Amp : READ2302G
QSPI : AT25SF641B
